item.title: Intel OEM Private Key Leak: A Blow to UEFI Secure Boot Security
item.description: - MSI was attacked by a ransomware group in April, resulting in the exfiltration of 1.5TB of data.

item.title: Sailing boat rescued by the GÃ¶theborg
item.description: - The sailing boat Corto lost its rudder while at sea and sent a distress call.

item.title: Atuin replaces your existing shell history with a SQLite database
item.description: - Atuin replaces the current shell history with a SQLite database and records more command context, also allowing encrypted synchronization of command history between machines using the Atuin server.

item.title: Wikipedia user edits over 90k uses of "comprised of"
item.description: - The phrase "comprised of" is often considered poor phrasing and criticized by language purists.

item.title: Open source Background Remover: Remove Background from images & video using AI
item.description: - BackgroundRemover is a command-line tool that uses AI to remove the background from images and videos.

item.title: I'm in Wyoming to celebrate the next nuclear breakthrough
item.description: - Bill Gates is celebrating the announcement of a new nuclear power plant funded by him in Kemmerer, Wyoming.

item.title: Shap-E: Generate 3D objects conditioned on text or images
item.description: - Shap-E is a code and model release for generating 3D objects based on text or images.

item.title: AI's biggest risk is the corporations that control them
item.description: - AI systems are increasingly being controlled by large corporations, which poses a risk to society.

item.title: It looks like GPT-4-32k is rolling out
item.description: - A new GPT-4 model with 32k parameters has been spotted in the Playground.

item.title: Using ChatGPT to generate a GPT project end-to-end
item.description: - The author uses ChatGPT to generate a project end-to-end, starting from project foundations, unit tests, and even the project name.
